ComicInfo.Summary: Julie isn't the only one with remnants of the atomic armor she wears. There is another, much darker soul, who lusts for the power the armor brings. The Dark One is determined to find Julie and claim her share of the armor. To do that, he will have to kill her! The Bikers come under attack from the stranger but when he goes for Dillon the armor retaliates with and impressive display that puts the stranger down long enough for them to escape. Ivy and Jack view the scene and try and figure out what happened as the stranger seems far from dead.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:06. [CVDB145937]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cain, Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin
